title: Featured Project
description: A Handy 7-seg display which displays time and has a stop watch function.
1. This web application is developed with HTML/CSS/Javascript for frontend and has fully functional backend features implemented with PHP and SQL.
2. Has fully functional user login system implemented with PHP and SQL database.
3. User can customize background image and welcome message when logged in.
4. Has a stopwatch feature with split time function.
5. Has world time feature with a list of 4 locations. Implemented with a web API. Background would change based on selected location and time of the day.
6. Download the files from my Github page and deploy it on a server to run the application.
7. Please refer to the Github page of the project for more detailed information.
